visualization_prompt: Generate a bar chart showing the ranking of top 10 EU countries by organic farming area percentage in 2018 using categorical bars with labeled percentages and a sequential color scheme.

title.text: Top 10 EU countries in organic farming area (2018)

visualization_explanation: The dataset is a one-dimensional ranked list comparing percentages of organic farming area across 10 EU countries. Data is sourced from Eurostat, a reputable EU statistical authority, ensuring reliability. Values range from 9.8% to 24.1%, formatted as percentages for immediate interpretability. A bar chart was selected to maximize Tufte's data-ink ratio, eliminating unnecessary gridlines and legend while emphasizing direct value comparisons. Cairo's perceptual principles are applied through positional encoding (country order) and length encoding (bar height), enabling accurate magnitude comparisons. The sequential green color palette (#a5d6a7 to #60A465) reinforces the ecological theme without introducing non-semantic hue variations. Data labels and axis formatting follow D3-style annotations ('{value}%') for zero-decimal precision, aligning with the source data's granularity.
